programme.title: An Unexpected Christmas
programme.desc: A speech writer makes a deal with his ex-girlfriend to pretend they are a couple to save his family's Christmas. It's not long before both the ruse and their feelings catch up with them.

programme.title: Finding Mr. Christmas
programme.desc: The hunks roll into giant plastic balls, crashing through Christmas trees in a wild Festive Face Off; with Hunter King as guest judge, teams perform a neighborhood holiday party scene that leads to a dramatic elimination.

programme.title: Baked With Love: Holiday
programme.desc: The teams get fancy for Santa with choux pastry, then bake their holiday dreams come true with cakes reminiscent of their best childhood gift.

programme.title: Believe in Christmas
programme.desc: With no other plans for Christmas, best friends Bea and Emilia travel to Christmasland, a magical place filled with hope, holiday miracles and romance.

programme.title: Time for Him to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Four days before Christmas, Elizabeth Athens receives a voicemail from a number she doesn't recognize. On the message, a man she doesn't know makes one final plea for the love of his life to give him a second chance.

programme.title: Our Holiday Story
programme.desc: A loving couple shares the story of how they met and fell in love when their daughter's boyfriend comes to meet them for the first time at Christmas.

programme.title: Never Been Chris'd
programme.desc: Home for the holidays, BFFs Naomi and Liz reconnect with high school crush Chris Silver. A complex love triangle forms, forcing them to take stock of their lives and find the value of friendship.

programme.title: 12 Gifts of Christmas
programme.desc: Anna is hired to become a personal Christmas shopper for Marc. As they work together, Anna helps Marc learn that Christmas giving should be about the importance of the gift, and Anna discovers she might find success as an artist in an unexpected way.

programme.title: A Very Merry Bridesmaid
programme.desc: Leah's 30th birthday is on Christmas Eve, the same day as her brother's wedding. Her childhood crush is back in town for the ceremony and he's determined to make sure her special day doesn't go by the wayside.

programme.title: Five More Minutes
programme.desc: Inspired by Scotty McCreery's song "Five More Minutes," a woman's Christmas wish is answered in unexpected ways when her late grandfather's journal turns up and reveals an untold romance.

programme.title: Christmas Wishes & Mistletoe Kisses
programme.desc: Weeks before Christmas, an interior designer is hired to decorate the estate of a wealthy businessman.

programme.title: Christmas on My Mind
programme.desc: Lucy Lovett wakes up holding a wedding dress and assumes she is about to marry the love her life, Zach Callahan.

programme.title: A Christmas Carousel
programme.desc: Lila is hired by the royal family of Ancadia to repair a carousel and must work with the prince to complete it by Christmas.

programme.title: Holiday Hotline
programme.desc: After leaving London, Abby works for a cooking hotline and connects with an anonymous caller, a single father who Abby is unknowingly smitten with in real life.

programme.title: Rocky Mountain Christmas
programme.desc: Sarah heads to her uncle's ranch to escape New York and the spotlight from a breakup. Returning home for the first time since her aunt passed, complications arise when Graham, a Hollywood star, arrives at the ranch to prepare for his next film.

programme.title: Melt My Heart This Christmas
programme.desc: Holly, a passionate glassblower, secretly displays her own art under a pseudonym while assisting a legendary glassblower to help Jack at a Christmas Fair.

programme.title: Three Wiser Men and a Boy
programme.desc: The Brenner brothers return and put on a holiday pageant for young Thomas while trying to cope with life's curveballs, including their mom's new boyfriend.

programme.title: Gingerbread Miracle
programme.desc: A man and an old high school friend try to sell his uncle's business -- a Mexican bakery that's famous for magical gingerbread cookies that grant wishes.

programme.title: Christmas in Notting Hill
programme.desc: Always too busy for love, famous soccer star Graham Savoy soon has a change of heart when he meets a visiting American during Christmastime.

programme.title: Check Inn to Christmas
programme.desc: Julia Crawley and Ryan Mason must unite their families during Crestridge's Centennial Christmas celebration to save their family inns from a chain resort.

programme.title: Christmas Getaway
programme.desc: After a surprising breakup with her boyfriend, a travel writer decides to go on the picturesque Christmas vacation planned for the two of them, alone.

programme.title: A Season for Family
programme.desc: Maddy's adopted son, Wesley, has just one wish for Christmas -- to meet his brother, Cody, who was adopted into a different family. Circumstances soon bring the two siblings together while sparks fly between their respective parents.

programme.title: Pride, Prejudice and Mistletoe
programme.desc: When Darcy returns to her hometown for Christmas, and she reconnects with Luke, a former rival, they must plan a charity event together. As she spends time with her family and Luke, she starts to realize what matters most in life.

programme.title: A Not So Royal Christmas
programme.desc: A tabloid journalist tries to land an interview with a reclusive count during the holidays. In response, the royal family asks a groundskeeper to pose as the count since the real one fled years ago.

programme.title: A Royal Queens Christmas
programme.desc: A prince makes his way to Queens, N.Y., when a local woman enlists his help for a children's Christmas show.

programme.title: Holiday Touchdown: A Chiefs Love Story
programme.desc: Chiefs superfan Alana tries to win the Fan of the Year Award as a Christmas gift for her family, falling in love with someone in the Chiefs front office along the way.

programme.title: Holiday Touchdown: A Bills Love Story
programme.desc: Sparks fly between two lifelong Buffalo Bills fans as they try to discover the identity of a mysterious Christmastime gift giver.

programme.title: A Cozy Christmas Inn
programme.desc: A real estate executive travels to Alaska during the holidays to acquire a bed-and-breakfast, only to discover it's owned by her ex. She's soon falling in love with the town and quite possibly him all over again.

programme.title: Murder, She Baked
programme.desc: Hannah Swensen has her hands full with two romantic suitors, her baking business, a murdered customer, and the case to find her customer's killer.

programme.title: Christmas Bells Are Ringing
programme.desc: Samantha, a freelance photographer, is returning to Cape Cod for the first time since the death of her mother years earlier. Having never been to the Cape during winter, she finds that it is a whole new experience than her many summers spent there.

programme.title: Holiday for Heroes
programme.desc: After a year's worth of letters exchanged between Audrey Brown and soldier Matt Evans, their worlds collide for the first time off the page.

programme.title: Debbie Macomber's Mr. Miracle
programme.desc: At Christmastime, angel-in-training Harry Mills (Rob Morrow) helps an insecure college student (Britt Irvin) realize her purpose in life.

programme.title: Christmas in Angel Falls
programme.desc: Guardian angel Gabby is sent to the town of Angel Falls to restore its Christmas spirit. As she helps the townspeople to revive their traditions, Gabby meets a volunteer fire chief who teaches her the truth about the love she admires from afar.

programme.title: The Santa Suit
programme.desc: A corporate bigwig (Kevin Sorbo) learns valuable lessons when Santa Claus transforms him into his look-alike.

programme.title: A Christmas for the Books
programme.desc: A romance expert conceals her recent breakup and asks a morning show producer to pretend they are a couple before she is exposed as a fraud. When he agrees, she never expects to find herself falling for him.

programme.title: Last Vermont Christmas
programme.desc: Megan and her two sisters reunite every Christmas in their childhood home. This year, though, their parents have put the house up for sale, and the buyer is Megan's former childhood sweetheart, Nash.

programme.title: Private Princess Christmas
programme.desc: After failing in her royal duties, Princess Violet is sent to an American leadership training program where she makes and unexpected connection with the stoic instructor, Captain Ryan.

programme.title: Debbie Macomber's Trading Christmas
programme.desc: Holiday travel leads to cross-country romances when a man (Tom Cavanagh) and a woman (Faith Ford) temporarily swap houses.

programme.title: I'll Be Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Jackie, a single mom and attorney, looks forward to spending Christmas alone with her daughter. Everything goes according to plan until Jackie's estranged father shows up on her door step.

programme.title: Coming Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Lizzie Richfield lands a job as house manager for the exquisite Ashford Estate in the Virginia countryside. While preparing the place for sale, Lizzie plans one final Christmas Eve gala for the family, although they seem to be a family in name only.

programme.title: Christmas at Grand Valley
programme.desc: Kelly returns to Grand Valley for Christmas. When Leo, a single dad, arrives in town with his kids to review a hotel, the two cross paths. As Kelly re-experiences traditions with Leo, she begins to find her way back to her passion for art.

programme.title: Karen Kingsbury's Maggie's Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: Maggie tries to maintain the balance of being a mother and having a career. When her son Jordan needs help at school, he meets Casey, a tutor, and the two quickly bond. As Casey becomes a father figure, Jordan wishes his mom could find love again.

programme.title: Inventing the Christmas Prince
programme.desc: Shelby is about to quit her job as a rocket engineer when her daughter becomes convinced that her Scrooge-like boss is a Christmas prince from a story.

programme.title: Sister Swap: A Hometown Holiday
programme.desc: Two sisters find a new sense of purpose and discover what they both truly need in life during the holidays.

programme.title: Sister Swap: Christmas in the City
programme.desc: Two sisters find a new sense of purpose and discover what they both truly need in life during the holidays.

programme.title: Operation Christmas
programme.desc: A single mother is determined not to let her boyfriend's deployment ruin her Christmas. She and her children decide to give back to other struggling military families on base.

programme.title: The Christmas Cottage
programme.desc: As maid of honor for her best friend Ava, cynical interior designer Lacey is tasked with decorating a honeymoon cottage for the newlyweds. Although it's a simple enough task, she didn't plan on being snowed in with the bride-to-be's sexy brother.

programme.title: Project Christmas Wish
programme.desc: A woman's life becomes transformed as she works toward granting a little girl's wish for a Christmas like she used to have with her mother.

programme.title: The Christmas Charade
programme.desc: Facing another dull Christmas alone, sparks fly when a risk-averse librarian accidentally gets wrapped up with a grinchy FBI agent in an undercover mission to save the Heart of Christmas.

programme.title: Falling Like Snowflakes
programme.desc: Determined to capture a rare shot of a 12-sided snowflake, a photographer enlists help from a childhood friend as they go on a mission they'll never forget.

programme.title: Holiday Hearts
programme.desc: While planning an annual Christmas party, Peyton is forced together with Ben to care for a friend's daughter.

programme.title: Long Lost Christmas
programme.desc: Hayley is an interior designer who plans to surprise her recently widowed mother with the perfect holiday present -- the extended family she knows her mom yearns for.

programme.title: Small Town Christmas
programme.desc: Nell's last stop on a nationwide book tour takes her to Springdale, the hometown of Emmett, a young man she met while both were junior copy editors at a New York publishing company.

programme.title: M3GAN
programme.desc: M3GAN is a marvel of artificial intelligence, a lifelike doll that's programmed to be a child's best friend. When a brilliant roboticist gives her young niece an M3GAN prototype, it soon becomes violent and does anything to protect the girl.

programme.title: Crank
programme.desc: A hit man (Jason Statham) awakes to the news that he has been poisoned and will die in an hour unless he keeps adrenaline coursing through his body.

programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: A crash landing leaves Kitai and his father Cypher stranded on Earth, a millennium after humanity's escape. With Cypher injured, Kitai must embark on a perilous journey to signal for help.

programme.title: Silent Hill
programme.desc: A woman (Radha Mitchell) searches for her missing daughter in a town that has been enveloped in a living darkness, against which the remaining humans fight a losing battle for survival.

programme.title: Candyman
programme.desc: An artist begins to explore the macabre history of Candyman, not knowing it would unravel his sanity and unleash a terrifying wave of violence that puts him on a collision course with destiny.

programme.title: Leatherface
programme.desc: A teenage Leatherface escapes from a mental hospital with three other inmates, kidnapping a young nurse and taking her on a road trip from hell, while being pursued by a lawman out for revenge.

programme.title: Primal
programme.desc: Hunter and collector Frank Walsh sails to America with a priceless white jaguar and a dangerous political assassin. When the prisoner manages to break free, Walsh must utilize his expert skills to capture the dangerous killer -- not dead, but alive.

programme.title: Halloween Ends
programme.desc: Four years after her last encounter with Michael Myers, Laurie Strode finally decides to liberate herself and embrace life. However, a local murder unleashes a cascade of violence and terror, forcing her to confront the evil she can't control.

programme.title: Silent Hill
programme.desc: A woman (Radha Mitchell) searches for her missing daughter in a town that has been enveloped in a living darkness, against which the remaining humans fight a losing battle for survival.

programme.title: Nope
programme.desc: A man and his sister discover something sinister in the skies above their California horse ranch, while the owner of a nearby theme park tries to profit from the mysterious, otherworldly phenomenon.

programme.title: Pacific Rim Uprising
programme.desc: Jake Pentecost, son of Stacker Pentecost, reunites with Mako Mori to lead a new generation of Jaeger pilots, including rival Lambert and 15-year-old hacker Amara, against a new Kaiju threat.

programme.title: Men in Black: International
programme.desc: The Men in Black have expanded to cover the globe but so have the villains of the universe. When aliens that can take the form of any human arrive on Earth, H and M embark on a globe-trotting adventure to save the agency -- and ultimately the world.

programme.title: Cage Warriors: Manchester
programme.desc: Najbolji borci današnjice obračunavaju se u bespoštednim okršajima. Jedan loš ili jedan savršen trenutak mogu potpuno promeniti tok karijere.

programme.title: Fudbal - Danska liga: Copenhagen - Brondby

programme.title: Košarka - NBA liga: Toronto - Cleveland
programme.desc: NBA liga je najcenjenije svetsko košarkaško takmičenje u kojem 30 severnoameričkih ekipa svake jeseni kreće u lov na prsten namenjen NBA prvaku.

programme.title: Pregled Bundeslige
programme.desc: Uz sve ono što nam je Nemačka podarila kroz istoriju ponosno stoji i Bundesliga. Najviši rang fudbalskog takmičenja osnovanog 1963. godine broji 18 ekipa koje svakog avgusta kreću u trku za popularnim...

programme.title: Fudbal: LŠ Azije - ELITE: Gangwon - Machida
programme.desc: 40 najboljih klubova Azije se obračunava za prestižni pehar. Da li će pobediti neko iz zemalja izlazećeg sunca ili neko od bogatih arapskih klubova? (LIVE).

programme.title: Pregled Evrokupa

programme.title: Košarka - Grčka liga: PAOK - Olympiacos

programme.title: Tenis - Davis Cup: FINALE: Italy - Spain
